sense.def:
A plan
je skrbno domišljen in pripravljen način, kako bomo nekaj dosegli.

seg.quote: I told them of my plan.
...a plan to give women more power.

sense.def:
To plan
pomeni podrobno razmisliti, kaj bomo naredili.

seg.quote: At breakfast I planned my day.
We must plan for the future.

sense.def:
To plan to do something
pomeni nameravati nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: What do you plan to do after college?
I was planning a career in law.
...news of the planned sale of 50,000 acres of state forests.

sense.def:
To have plans
pomeni nameravati nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: The gales forced him to change his plans.

sense.def:
To plan something
pomeni odločiti se, kaj bodo najpomembnejši deli tistega, kar bomo naredili, zgradili ali ustvarili, in kako bodo razporejeni.

seg.quote: How do you plan a book?

sense.def:
A plan of something
je podrobna skica tistega, kar nameravamo zgraditi ali narediti.

seg.quote: ...the plan and overall design of the building.
Make a neat plan of your new home.

sense.def:
A plan of action
ali
a plan of campaign
je niz dejanj, ki jih nameravamo izvesti, da bi tako nekaj dosegli.

seg.quote: His plan of campaign is to cycle into town and collect the money personally.

sense.def:
To plan on doing something
pomeni imeti namen nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: I plan on staying in London.
